name: Skytanking Ovenon Website
desc: Website design and development for Skytanking Ovenon

content.title: Problem
content.text: After acquired by Hamburg based Skytanking Group, the Turkish Aviation Fuelling Company Ovenon, with its new name Skytanking Ovenon hired Rolakosta to design and develop their new corporate website. Our main goal was to merge the needs of Ovenon brand with their new global partner's vision and brand identity.

content.title: Design
content.text: After careful examination of the Skytanking website and detailed briefing process by Ovenon's lead team the design process began with the initial wireframing. After completed the architecture and the overall layout we iterated through the visual design with a modular approach where we've built variety of design choices for every module available on the page. The design process was finished in the browser by implementing the interaction layer including the animations and responsive layout.

content.title: Results
content.text: The light and modern design of the website gained very positive feedback from the users and the companies involved in the process. Thanks to the user-friendly Wordpress panel we have integrated the website is getting more content updates than before which makes it more alive than its counterparts.
